Reviews.Title: “Great location, basic and good hotel!”
Reviews.Author: HappiestGirl80
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice pleased located close underground station paddington searching hotel honest didnt expect 5 star hotel paying low price hotel affordable location clean bath sleep thats exactly ive staff nice comfortable clean breakfast bad definitely return hotel

Reviews.Title: “A total disappointment from check-in”
Reviews.Author: MsM123
Reviews.Content: disappointed hotel ideal location close paddington station hyde park walking distance oxford street unfortunately balance service overall quality hotel arrival lift broke third floor elderly family trapped inside alarm bell activated staff acknowledge faulty lift physically alerted reception offer apology disgraceful definitely accommodate 3 adults requested 30 degrees fan offered windows unable air conditioning bathroom barely shower bed covers appeared soiled attempting sleep heard irate neighbour yelling 4 hours night issues reception following day told maybe move basement air conditioning declined offer alerted staff seeking accommodation elsewhere received reply havent 24 hours notice lose payment finally agreement 24 hours notice checking day unhappy overall service fan chase fan reception 3 times recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights basement found staff helpful lovely clean 2 toilet little clean breakfast staff nice helpful stay central london
